Name: Football League Participation
Description: Football league participation is a time mediated link (based on Football League Seasons, and not dates), associating a football team to the leagues in which they have competed.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: The season this team began playing in this league

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: The last season this team spent in the league during this period of participation.

Properties.Name: Team
Properties.Description: The team participating in this league
